title: How to find girl band members from India - Quora

response.answer_text: We are 2 girls and one is rapper and one is vocalist both can dance well can any one help if any one can help please contact us through:-@RV_735(INSTA ID)
Look out for them at “HIP” places. There are lots of them. Also try to go for institutes and live gigs. hope this helps :)
U can make Ur own band in the area where u live .. u can make a page on fb and ask wo want to join it up.
